products.title: Top Grey wool top
products.description: Show your Android pride by placing these 8 fun stickers on your technology products or accessories!

products.title: Grey wool skirt
products.description: Midi skirt with asymmetrical hem. Medium-low waistline. Wrap closure with metal rings and long logo ribbons. Made of a fine, grey melange double-sided wool knit. The underside is customised with a contrasting FF motif, visible on the side drape.

products.title: Blue wool pullover
products.description: Relaxed-fit pullover with high collar. Made of powder blue wool, featuring deep cut-out details on the sleeve underside and an asymmetrical slit at the front. The collar is embellished with a small slit fastened with matching-colour satin logo ties.

products.title: Beige cashmere and wool pullover
products.description: Long-sleeved pullover. Made of light beige wool and cashmere yarn. The underside of the border is decorated with the Fendi Mirror logo printed in a delicate contrasting tone, and visible in the knotted motif on the left side. Finished with cut-out detail on the neckline.

products.title: White jersey T-shirt
products.description: Cropped T-shirt with crew neck and short sleeves. Made of white jersey. Embellished with zipped patch pocket on the chest, raised Selleria stitching and contrasting Fendi Roma logo.

products.title: VERSACE ALLOVER BOMBER JACKET
products.description: A padded bomber jacket featuring a Versace Allover logo print, complete with striped ribbed trims.

products.title: LA MASCHERA LOGO SWEATSHIRT
products.description: Made from cotton jersey, this crewneck sweatshirt has dropped shoulders and features a La Maschera rendition of the Varsity logo, a proud symbol of belonging to the Versace family.

products.title: LOGO WINDBREAKER JACKET
products.description: In a lightweight nylon construction, this hooded windbreaker features a drawstring hem and hood, and multiple patch and flap pockets. The technical style is detailed with a breathable mesh lining and foiled logo print at the cuffs.

products.title: MEDUSA '95 CARGO MINI SKIRT
products.description: A satin-finish mini skirt featuring the Medusa '95 belt hardware at the waist and statement cargo pockets at the front.

products.title: GRECA ODISSEA TRAINERS
products.description: With a top-stitched Greca motif on the sides, these lightweight Odissea trainers are set on dynamic rubber soles for a statement landing. They're detailed with a debossed logo at the heel counter.

products.title: VERSACE ALLOVER DENIM JACKET
products.description: In a boxy fit, this denim jacket features a washed Versace Allover logo, accented by enamel Medusa buttons. The collared style is finished with a leather logo patch and dual patch and side pockets.

products.title: MEDUSA SINGLE-BREASTED BLAZER
products.description: This essential single-breasted blazer is crafted from pure virgin wool in a tailored silhouette. Sharp shoulder and a cinched waist are accented by a single Medusa button. The style is complete with peaked lapels.

products.title: SLASHED LA MASCHERA LOGO HOODIE
products.description: This essential single-breasted blazer is crafted from pure virgin wool in a tailored silhouette. Sharp shoulder and a cinched waist are accented by a single Medusa button. The style is complete with peaked lapels.
